# Groll

*A helpful, dice-rolling, goblin that lives in your shell!*

    $ groll 2d6 + 1
     -> 3

    $ groll -v 1d20 + 3
     -> rolling 1d20 + 3
     -> 5 + 3
     -> 8

## Installation

    pip install groll

## Usage

    Usage: groll [OPTIONS] [ARGS]...

    Options:
    -v, --verbose
    --help         Show this message and exit.
